author: Sam <me@samcday.com.au> (http://samcday.com.au/)
name: google-spreadsheets
description: Google Spreadsheet Data API for Node.js

scripts.build: browserify --standalone Spreadsheets lib/spreadsheets.js -o lib/spreadsheets.browser.js && uglifyjs lib/spreadsheets.browser.js -o lib/spreadsheets.browser.min.js
